messages.subject: OT: Spam letter
messages.msgSnippet: Hi. Earlier tonight, I found out -- through my own admitted stupidity -- that my password to America Online had been stolen and an email sent out to over nine
messages.messageBody:
Hi.
Earlier tonight, I found out -- through my own admitted stupidity --
that my password to America Online had been stolen and an email sent out to
over nine hundred recipients. If anyone received a letter from my email address
between about 21:25 and 22:00 (9.25 and 10pm) EST tonight, it did NOT come
from me. I apologise to anyone this may have happened to. My password has been
successfully changed, so that the one that was stolen will not work. Again,
my apologies.

Tim


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
